title: The Balm Timebalm Foundation, Medium, .75 Ounce
description: Good things start with a good foundation our cult-classic timebalm concealer was such a hit with its vitamin packed, rejuvenating formula that we took it to another level. Paraben-free, perfect for all skin types and conditions and lasts all hours of the day (and night), our timebalm foundation crafts a flawless face by smoothing out imperfections and leaving a perfect canvas for further beautification. By making this foundation your starting point you are guaranteed to get some serious face time.

title: The Balm Timebalm Face Primer, 1 Ounce
description: A silky, vitamin-rich face primer helps conceal fine lines and wrinkles instantly enriched with vitamins A, C and E to protect skin against free radical aggressions blended with anti-inflammatory allantoin and bioflavonoid to soothe stressed skin creates a calm, smooth, flawless and youthful looking complexion.

title: The Balm What's Your Type Mascara, Body Builder Black, 0.40 Ounce
description: Push the limits of your lashes by layering an extra coat to take your volume to the max. A long-wearing, non-clumping mascara. Incredibly prolongs lashes and creates volume.
